Bullseye.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% when getting an elimination.

Daring Escape.card_desc: [Planted] Gain {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 3s after Planted ends.

Desert Shadow.card_desc: [Withdraw] Your first shot breaking Stealth with Withdraw deals 25% more damage.

Explosive Arrows.card_desc: [Impaler Arrow] Impaler Arrow now explodes on contact for an additional 300 damage and knocks back all enemies in the radius, but can no longer stun.

Grounded.card_desc: [Planted] Regenerate {scale=50|50} Health per second during Planted.

Master Archer.card_desc: [Planted] Reduce the cooldown of Planted by {scale=1|1}s.

Mirage.card_desc: [Withdraw] Reduce the cooldown of Withdraw by {scale=1|1}s.

Poise.card_desc: [Armor] Reduced the movement speed penalty while drawing your Long Bow by {scale=20|20}%.

Quick Sand.card_desc: [Impaler Arrow] Reduce the cooldown of Impaler Arrow by {scale=0.6|0.6}s

Run Like the Wind.card_desc: [Withdraw] After using Withdraw gain {scale=7|7}% Movement Speed for 3s.

Run Them Down.card_desc: [Impaler Arrow] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 4s after hitting Impaler Arrow.

Shimmer.card_desc: [Withdraw] Dropping below {scale=15|15}% health resets the cooldown of Withdraw.

Skewer.card_desc: [Impaler Arrow] Successful hits with Impaler Arrow reduce the cooldown of planted by {scale=1|1}s

Strike True.card_desc: [Impaler Arrow] Heal for {scale=70|70} when striking an enemy with Impaler arrow.
